caption: This song is a lively Indian instrumental. The tempo is fast with lively brass bands playing harmony, energetic drums ,Nagpada and dhol and other Indian percussion and synthesiser with digital arrangements. There is a dialogue of a man and woman superimposed over the music, with sighing and giggling in the background. The music is typical Indian Baarat music. It is happy, cheerful, vivacious, energetic, youthful, vigorous and upbeat.
